text: tavada api obata (obage mutun mittanta) sveta varna valakulu valin sevana laba dimata salasva, oba venuven ‘mannu’, ‘salva’da pahala kara, (ovunta) “api obata laba demin tikhena parisuddha vu meva anubhava karamin sitinu” (yayi niyoga kara sitiyemu. ehet apage ana kada kala) ovun apata kisima haniyak kara dæmuve næta. ehet ovun tamanta, tamanma napurak kara gatha
